Kup/nighlight:

Kup ducked when the shot hit the blackfortress and shielded Nightlight with 
his body in order to avoid her any damage. Then he left on the floor 
Nightlight and opened his com link to Rattrap, and the others outside "I'm 
heading towards the exit... Cover me, Nightlight is with me but she's... she 
is sedated... "Then he opened comlink to lord Elder "Lord Elder, he 
situation here has complicated... a bit"he knew that Elita may be listening 
so he didnt liked to worry her"I'm trying to escape the Blackfortress with 
Nightlight, Rodimus and tucson are trying to rescue windlord" he typed an 
encoded message to Him "Nightlight isnt in condition to see her daughter, we 
will need a place to hold her while she is reprogramed and we need to keep 
elita away from her"

Then the old autobot took Nighlight and continue his trip towards the exit

--------------------------------------------------
From: "Preston Carroll" <supercyclonus@...>
Sent: Tuesday, April 27, 2010 11:37 AM
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Subject: Re: The Light of the Flame!

> Who: LEGACY, Quickstride, Rat Trap
> Location: Outside the Black fortress
>
> Legacy moved ever closer as he recieved Tuscon's message . . .
>
>> " This is Tucson Prime, I read you Legacy. We have managed to round 
>> everyone up, but we're still trying to apprehend Darkhawk. Night Shift is 
>> attempting that now. Legacy, while I have your attention, I need to 
>> confirm some intel with you, regarding an ancient legend about the 
>> mythical Hydra. From what I've read, a hydra can not be killed by 
>> decapitation, which only promotes the growth of multiple heads at one 
>> time. Yet, in this legend, it gives the clue on how to slay the beast. 
>> Direct fire is the only way to slay a hydra. Can this knowledge be 
>> adapted and utilized as a weapon against Hydras? Can Rodimus and I use 
>> the powers within us to subdue him as this legend fortells? I wish to 
>> confirm this before I proceede."
>
> Legacy paused for a moment in an obvious attempt to recall the
> requested information. "You are referencing a human mythological
> narrative." Legacy stated. "Human datum is not my forte, however I
> have been programed with much of their lore."
>
> Legacy floated clearly into view near the Black Fortress as he
> continued his communication with Tuscon, "The one fable recounts a
> greek hero identified as Hercules who was able to slay the
> mythological beast by cutting off each cranial appendage and then
> burning the stump before a new set would grow. An interesting addition
> to that is that one appendage - or head was said to be immortal or
> unkillable, and had to be placed under a rock."
>
> "As to whether this is applicable to Hydras?" Legacy paused for a
> moment and then continued, "Insufficient data, however all presumptive
> analysis would seem to indicate that it would be largely ineffective.
> Niether Galvatron nor Megatron, the two sparks that make up Hydras,
> have evinced any specific or unusual weakness towards matix energies.
> Despite outward appearance Hydras is still generally Cybertronian in
> make up, his outward appearance is only an adaptation to his
> surroundings. Also he does not appear to have any of the specific
> vulnerablities or benefits of being a mythological hydra, save for the
> ones created by his transform circuits and innate weaponry and
> abilities."
>
> Legacy hovered over the ground for a moment as he observed the
> surrounding area, then with the grinding of gears he shifted into his
> alternate mode, that of a cybertronian tank, complete with a massive
> foward cannon and a dual turrent cannon as well. "What gives me pause
> . . . " Legacy said as he he landed on the ground, the force of his
> landing cracking the ground beneath him slightly. ". . . is that the
> civilization that created that myth on this planet will not exist for
> the greater part of 4 million years. How is it that you have come
> across such information?"
>
> As he sent his question to Tuscon Legacy turned his attention to Rat
> Trap and Quickstride,
>
>> Outside, Rat Trap and Quickstride also get the transmission.
>>
>> "This is Rat Trap, I read ya Legacy, Quickstride'n I are on standby out 
>> here, just in case they need a little distraction and some backup."
>
> "Perhaps it is time for that diversion, as from all indication the
> entirety of Predacon forces are closing in on Tuscon and Rodimus'
> position." Legacy said to Rat Trap and Quickstride as he oriented his
> cannon on the Black Fortress' main entrance.
>
> "Prepare yourselves!" Legacy said both over the radio to the others as
> well as to those nearby. Meanwhile his fore cannon glowed for a moment
> looking like a spear of corruscating energy. Then it errupted and
> massive energies went hurtling at the Black Fortress, creating a
> searing path across the magma before striking home against the front
> door!
>
> OOC: Airly, it's up to you if Legacy is able to force open the fornt door.
>
> Preston
